itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, March 27, 2013
description: Lawyers who defend the poor in federal court say sequester cuts could jeopardize the fairness of the criminal justice system. Leaders of the BRICS nations -- Brazil, Russia, India, China and South Africa -- are wrapping up a summit today with a plan to create a new bank to fuel economic growth in the developing world. And is Marlins owner Jeffrey Loria the most hated man in baseball?
byline: Adam Allington, Nancy Marshall-Genzer, Jeff Tyler, Queena Kim, David Brancaccio, Matt Davies, Jeremy Hobson and Julia Coronado
